entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:21 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 09:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: E 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
